simple.name: rate_index
simple.description: The index of the decoding rate from the supported rates table. For a custom rate use rate_index 0

simple.name: k
simple.description: Input bits at a time (for the custom rate rate_index=0) The encoder rate = k/n

simple.name: K
simple.description: Constrain length for the custom rate. (rate_index=0)

simple.name: n
simple.description: Output bits at a time for the custom rate index, has to match the number of suplied polynomials (rate_index=0) The encoder rate = k/n

simplesequence.name: generatorPolynomials
simplesequence.description: A list of generator polynomials in OCTAL for the custom rate (rate_index=0)

simplesequence.name: port_list
simplesequence.description: Returns a sequence of strings with the names of the available Provides ports
